document_data.name: Tharnadar Edge
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharnadar Edge''' was a village in [[Turmish]] during the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: [[Thabrant Swordsilver]] lived in Tharnadar Edge until he returned to [[Cormyr]] in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], after his daughter [[Caladnei]] rode there to tell him about the death of [[Maela Rynduvyn]], her mother and his wife.
